headline: Ask HN: Cloudflare Pages vs. Netlify vs. Others?
description: Cloudflare Pages was released just over a year ago. I have some side projects and wanted to setup static sites (using git). Would love to hear from people what they are doing to deploy mostly static sites. I am a fan of Cloudflare in general so definitely looking at Cloudflare pages. Netlify seemed ok when I tried 3-4 years ago but their free plan seemed a bit slow on loading the pages.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: Cloudflare Pages vs. Netlify vs. Others?
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: Cloudflare Pages vs. Netlify vs. Others?
description_zh-Hans: Cloudflare Pages是在一年多以前发布的。我有一些副业，想建立静态网站（使用git）。很想听听大家是如何部署大部分静态网站的。我是Cloudflare的粉丝，所以肯定会关注Cloudflare页面。我在3-4年前尝试过Netlify，但他们的免费计划在加载页面时似乎有点慢。
description_zh-Hant: Cloudflare Pages是在一年多以前發佈的。我有一些副業，想建立靜態網站（使用git）。很想聽聽大家是如何部署大部分靜態網站的。我是Cloudflare的粉絲，所以肯定會關注Cloudflare頁面。我在3-4年前嘗試過Netlify，但他們的免費計劃在加載頁面時似乎有點慢。
